title: Civil Service Statistics Data Summary Tool
summary: The Data Summary Tool is a spreadsheet that allows users to see how a specific department differs from the Civil Service average or from another government department. For example the proportions of the headcounts of different government departments split between men and women, full-timers and part-timers, permanent and temporary appointments, regions where staff work and a number of others.
